data.name: گروه مژده وصل شیراز
data.description: Mojdeh Vasl shiraz was founded in 1980 with 11 graduated students & some of the lecture of Siemens college in Iran as a mold shop, after a while they start manufacturing plastic parts and established Mojdeh Vasle Shiraz (MVS). 10 years later, they shifted to automotive market and soon they became the biggest plastic engine automotive manufacturer in Iran.
